com.worksap.nlp.sudachi

クラス PathRewritePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.PathRewritePlugin

  • public abstract class PathRewritePlugin
extends java.lang.Object
    A plugin that rewrite the best path of the lattice.

    Dictionary initialize this plugin with Settings. It can be referred as Plugin.settings.

    The following is an example of settings. 

    
   {
     "class" : "com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.PathRewritePlugin",
     "example" : "example setting"
   }

        public PathRewritePlugin()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setUp

        public void setUp(Grammar grammar)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Set up the plugin. Tokenizer calls this method for setting up this plugin.
        パラメータ:
        grammar - the grammar of the system dictionary
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if reading something is failed

      • rewrite

        public abstract void rewrite(InputText<?> text,
                             java.util.List<LatticeNode> path,
                             Lattice lattice)
        Rewrite the path of the lattice. The path is a list of nodes of the lattice. To join some nodes you can use concatenate(java.util.List<com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.LatticeNode>, int, int, com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.Lattice, java.lang.String) or concatenateOov(java.util.List<com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.LatticeNode>, int, int, short, com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.Lattice).
        パラメータ:
        text - the input text
        path - the best path of the lattice
        lattice - the lattice

      • concatenate

        public LatticeNode concatenate(java.util.List<LatticeNode> path,
                               int begin,
                               int end,
                               Lattice lattice,
                               java.lang.String normalizedForm)
        Concatenate the sequence of nodes in the path. The sequence begins at the specified begin and extends to the node at index end - 1.

        The concatenated node has the POS ID of the head of the sequence.

        パラメータ:
        path - the path
        begin - the beginning index
        end - the ending index
        lattice - the lattice
        normalizedForm - if normalizedForm is null, concatenate the normalizedForms of each words
        戻り値:
        the concatenated node
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if begin or end are negative, greater than the length of the sequence, or begin equals or is greater than end

      • concatenateOov

        public LatticeNode concatenateOov(java.util.List<LatticeNode> path,
                                  int begin,
                                  int end,
                                  short posId,
                                  Lattice lattice)
        Concatenate the sequence of nodes in the path. The sequence begins at the specified begin and extends to the node at index end - 1.

        The concatenated node is marked as OOV.

        パラメータ:
        path - the path
        begin - the beginning index
        end - the ending index
        posId - the POS ID of the concatenated node
        lattice - the lattice
        戻り値:
        the concatenated OOV node
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if begin or end are negative, greater than the length of the sequence, or begin equals or is greater than end

      • getCharCategoryTypes

        public java.util.Set<CategoryType> getCharCategoryTypes(InputText<?> text,
                                                        LatticeNode node)
        Return the set of the category types of the node.
        パラメータ:
        text - the input text
        node - the node
        戻り値:
        the set of the category types of the node
